item.title: Old HP Model
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Open your client.java
Find:

Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337

You should see something close to

Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 18, 36, 1, 0x383838, anInt964 - 6, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 18, 36, 1, 0x383838, anInt964 - 1, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 19, 38, 1, 0x383838, anInt964 - 5, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 19, 38, 1, 0x383838, anInt964 - 2, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 19, 38, 1, 0x383838, anInt964 - 4, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 19, 38, 1, 0x383838, anInt964 - 3, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 18, 1, 1, 0xA0A890, anInt964 - 4, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 18, 1, 1, 0x687060, anInt964 - 3, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 15, 33, 1, 0xA0A890, anInt964 - 4, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 15, 33, 1, 0x687060, anInt964 - 3, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 15, 32, 1, 0x383838, anInt964 - 4, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 15, 32, 1, 0x383838, anInt964 - 3, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 16, 32, 1, 0x687060, anInt964 - 5, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 16, 32, 1, 0x687060, anInt964 - 2, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 16, 32, 1, 0xA0A890, anInt964 - 4, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 16, 32, 1, 0xA0A890, anInt964 - 3, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(4, anInt964 - 5, anInt963 - 15, 0x60F860, i1, 0); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, anInt964 - 5, anInt963 - 15, 0x18C020, i1, 0); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, anInt964 - 2, anInt963 - 15, 0x18C020, i1, 0); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(4, anInt964 - 5, (anInt963 - 15) + i1, 0x687060, 30 - i1, 0); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, anInt964 - 5, (anInt963 - 15) + i1, 0xA0A890, 30 - i1, 0); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, anInt964 - 2, (anInt963 - 15) + i1, 0xA0A890, 30 - i1, 0);

Delete that or note it out and replace with

Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(5, anInt964 - 3, anInt963 - 15, 65280, i1, 0); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(5, anInt964 - 3, (anInt963 - 15) + i1, 0xff0000, 30 - i1, 0);

Normal hp bar. There you go.

Read full topic

I dont have a very valid one, but

Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(4, anInt964 - 4, (anInt963 - 15) + i1, 0xff0000, 30 - i1, 0);

try unzipping a fresh client, and search that ( well something like that not sure about the absoulte numbers )
but that is your HP bar method in a nutshell.
